div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DeviceAssociation|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `DeviceAssociation` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Device`. Element `DeviceAssociation` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Device`, but has no comparisons.
Element `DeviceAssociation.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Device.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `DeviceAssociation.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Device.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `DeviceAssociation.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Device.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `DeviceAssociation.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Device.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `DeviceAssociation.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Device.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Element `DeviceAssociation.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Device.identifier`, but has no comparisons.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `DeviceAssociation.device` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `DeviceAssociation.device` has a context of Device based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Device`.
Element `DeviceAssociation.category` has a context of Device based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Device`.
Element `DeviceAssociation.status` has a context of Device based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Device`.
Element `DeviceAssociation.statusReason` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Device.statusReason`, but has no comparisons.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.subject`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `DeviceAssociation.subject` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `DeviceAssociation.subject` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Device.patient`, but has no comparisons.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `DeviceAssociation.bodyStructure` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `DeviceAssociation.bodyStructure` has a context of Device based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Device`.
Element `DeviceAssociation.period` has a context of Device based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Device`.
Element `DeviceAssociation.operation` has a context of Device based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Device`.

Element `DeviceAssociation.operation.status` is part of an existing definition because parent element `DeviceAssociation.operation` requires a cross-version extension. Element `DeviceAssociation.operation.status` has a context of Device based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Device`.

Element `DeviceAssociation.operation.operator` is part of an existing definition because parent element `DeviceAssociation.operation` requires a cross-version extension. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `DeviceAssociation.operation.operator` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `DeviceAssociation.operation.operator` has a context of Device based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Device`.

Element `DeviceAssociation.operation.period` is part of an existing definition because parent element `DeviceAssociation.operation` requires a cross-version extension. Element `DeviceAssociation.operation.period` has a context of Device based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Device`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
